headline: Creative Wizardry
subline: Crafting videos, visuals, and stories that capture the imagination.
intro: I’m Whit — a Dallas-based editor, motion graphics artist, and all-around post-production problem solver. I take ideas from raw footage to polished final cut, blending editing, storytelling, design, and VFX to make work that actually *sticks*. When I’m not in the edit bay, you’ll find me behind decks as **Wooper**.
